content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Nesibe. I appreciate your time. I am looking to maximize my profits from renting out the apartment, so I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What rental price are you willing to propose?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to offer 750 Euros per month.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: That's a reasonable offer, Nesibe. However, I am looking for a higher rental price to maximize my profits. I am willing to negotiate, but I need to know more about your budget and what you are looking for in terms of the apartment. Can you tell me more about your needs and preferences?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am a student and I am looking for a affordable place to live, but I am willing to pay a reasonable price. I don't need a lot of space, just a place to sleep, eat and study. The apartment should be in a safe and convenient location.

I would also like to know if you are flexible on the rental price and if there is any possibility of a lower price.

Thank you for your time.

I would like to accept the rental price of 750 Euros per month. TERMINATE.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Nesibe. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and your flexibility on the rental price. Based on our discussion, I am willing to agree to the rental price of 750 Euros per month.

Please let me know if you have any questions or if there is anything else I can help you with. I look forward to hearing from you.
name: Heinrich Heine
